commands.name: az networkfabric ipextendedcommunity create
commands.summary: Create a Ip Extended Community resource.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric ipextendedcommunity create --ip-extended-community-rules
                                            --resource-group
                                            --resource-name
                                            [--annotation]
                                            [--location]
                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--tags]

commands.name: az networkfabric ipextendedcommunity delete
commands.summary: Delete the Ip Extended Community resource.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric ipextendedcommunity delete [--ids]
                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--resource-group]
                                            [--resource-name]
                                            [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkfabric ipextendedcommunity list
commands.summary: List all Ip Extended Communities in the provided resource group or subscription.

commands.name: az networkfabric ipextendedcommunity show
commands.summary: Show details of the provided Ip Extended Community resource.

commands.name: az networkfabric ipextendedcommunity update
commands.summary: Update to update certain properties of the IP Extended Community resource.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric ipextendedcommunity update [--annotation]
                                            [--ids]
                                            [--ip-extended-community-rules]
                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--resource-group]
                                            [--resource-name]
                                            [--subscription]
                                            [--tags]

commands.name: az networkfabric ipextendedcommunity wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
